pr_title: #18939  File name comparison should not be case sensitive

timeline.message: #18939  File name comparison should not be case sensitive

timeline.bodyText: Codacy found an issue: Useless parentheses.
timeline.author: dev-dotcms
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -737,7 +737,10 @@ static Path getSystemAppsDescriptorDirectory() throws URISyntaxException, IOExce
         final Set<Path> systemFileNames = systemFiles.stream().map(Path::getFileName)
                 .collect(Collectors.toSet());
         final Set<Path> filteredUserFiles = userFiles.stream()
-                .filter(path -> !systemFileNames.contains(path.getFileName())).collect(Collectors.toSet());
+                .filter(path -> systemFileNames.stream().noneMatch(
+                        systemPath -> systemPath.toString()
+                                .equalsIgnoreCase((path.getFileName().toString().toLowerCase()))))
